name: Usertribe
tag_list: usability, usertest, user-experience, ux, ui, conversion, conversionrate, bootstrapped
overview:
Usertribe is your way to convert more visitors into clients. With a tribe of both testers and user experience consultants, we provide a service that deliver insights that is used to optimize online stores, websites, mobile websites, mobile apps, designs and campaigns. It’s fast, easy and a great investment.

What we do is simple. We let users solve tasks on your website from their own homes. We record what the user do online and what they say so we can gain actual knowledge of what to optimize. Our UX experts analyse and dig out the gold for you - so you can keep a focus on your other tasks.

The idea of Usertribe came about in 2010. Thore Fogh Johansen and Jonas Alexandersson launched a Danish crowd based user testing tool, because Thore needed an ‘easy to use’ tool to complete his online business optimization tool box.

In the process of creating this user testing tool, we came to realize that this service would have a great impact on many online businesses. Getting to know your target users is simply the easiest and best way to increase conversions and do good business. Start investing in optimizing your website or service:
